entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Methodical_others test JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int crashing #69832
  • Outerloop stress legs triggering on PRs they shouldn't #69829
  • Unhandled SECURITY_STATUS (0x80090016) in SecurityStatusAdapterPal results in InternalException #69828
  • Strange error message from LibraryImport #69827
  • UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests fail on some Mono runtimes #69823
  • Eliminate the need to preserve struct handles for `SIMD` types #69822
    Future
  • It is difficult to determine whether TieredPGO and ReadyToRun are enabled #69820
  • IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() marked as non-nullable even though it can return null values as a LEFT JOIN #69817
  • The BlockingCollection<T> backed by a custom collection doesn't work properly #69816
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for failures due to stack overflow #69810
    7.0.0
  • Strange discrepancies between char[] and string marshaling #69809
    7.0.0
  • Support Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 in JIT rolling build #69807
    Future
  • Test failures in hashing on Browser #69806
    7.0.0
  • Running a simple ASP.NET core application causing Coreclr.dll throwing exception #69805
  • [NativeAOT] FijiTimeZoneTests Fails on NativeAOT #69801
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.Tests.OperatorTests.ExplicitOperators_FromValues failing on Android x86 in rolling build of runtime-extra-platforms #69800
  • Bad performance with Blazor WebAssembly even when using AOT compilation #69797
    7.0.0
  • Mono incorrectly handles floating-point to long conversions on Arm64 #69795
    7.0.0
  • Mono incorrectly handles nuint to floating-point conversions #69794
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Quic.MsQuicException on rolling build of runtime #69792
  • Socket.BeginAccept in .NET 6 throws an unobserved SocketException #69790
  • [wasm][debugger] Differentiate between virtual and new virtual in derived members on GetProperties #69788
    7.0.0
  • `FileSystemEntry.ToSpecifiedFullPath()` returns wrong result when `OriginalRootDirectory` is `X:` #69785
  • Mono does not specify source to utf-8, and fails to build on MBCS locale #69781
  • [API Proposal]: Add TarExtractOptions/TarCreateOptions #69780
  • [API Proposal]: Implement decimal floating-point types that conform to the IEEE 754 standard. #69777
  • Winmm error with latest version of System.Speech package #69776
  • [Analyzer]: Enforce Curiously Recurring Template Pattern in Generic Math interfaces #69775
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_SyncStream.MultipleThreadsLooping #69772

Closed

  • WindowsCryptographicException cannot be serialized #69704
    7.0.0
  • Provide File System Support for Blazor wasm #60907
  • WebAssembly Browser App project fails to run #67236
    7.0.0
  • Duplicate logging in `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host` #69793
  • ARM64 glibc runtime builds on Ubuntu 18.04, not CentOS 7 #69811
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Linq/Linq/Linq.sh` timing out on linux #69518
  • Error using double or float values with WebAssembly #67970
    7.0.0
  • OpenSslCryptographicException: error:03000098:digital envelope routines::invalid digest on CentOS Stream 9 #65874
    7.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper.AddOneArgTypeHelper when using ILGenerator.EmitCall on an interface method with 'in' arguments. #67084
    7.0.0
  • Vector.ConditionalSelect and Vector128.ConditionalSelect don't emit vpblendvb on x64 #67039
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequests_Succeeds times out #55957
    Future
  • runtime-extra-platforms rolling build failure: Docker Internal Server Error - The container operating system does not match the host operating system. #67728
  • .NET Standard 2.1 vs .NET 6 Threading in Blazor WASM #61381
  • Korean language support on WebAssembly regression #69787
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly error "IDBFS is not defined" #65299
  • UTF8 pointer + nuint overloads #68256
  • Test failure: System.ConfigurationTests.AppSettingsTests/AddToAppSettings_Save #21510
    Future
  • Test failure: System.ConfigurationTests.ConfigurationElementCollectionTests/EqualsNullIsFalse #21512
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] test failure: Public_Interop_ExactVersion_BufferContent_Success fails with CONNECTION_IDLE #63009
    7.0.0
  • Support optional client certificates #57308
    7.0.0
  • Audit source-generated marshallers for integer overflow bugs #69532
    7.0.0
  • Source generated interop should be unconditionally ExactSpelling=true #69541
    7.0.0
  • Duplicate ManagedToUnmanagedTransition and UnmanagedToManagedTransition calls in profiler #69717
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup a few more allocations in X.509 #69831
    area-System.Security
  • Remove extraneous diagnostic #69830
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix whitespace in repro project #69825
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Mark IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() as nullable #69821
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Relax the addres exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix value type unboxing bug #69815
    area-System.Reflection
  • Renaming files because they don't reflect the IL code used in the tests #69814
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Reduce unnecessary casting/locals in pinning path #69804
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Annotate System.Runtime tests for NativeAOT #69803
  • Some clean-up of host tests #69802
    area-Host
  • Disable failing MsQuic tests on Windows #69798
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update RHEL and CentOS images #69791
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #69783
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the segment fault within JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState. #69782
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VM calling convention detection for some pinvokes #69774
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • A few tweaks to regex source generator comments / naming for lookbehinds #69773
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Update 'main' branding to release/7.0-preview6 #69813
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow ToCryptographicException to create serializable exceptions #69765
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Use stack buffers and return data to pool in EC point encoding #69812
    area-System.Security
  • merge main into release/7.0-preview5 branch #69824
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow span copy for char arrays instead of manual copy loop #69764
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix memory issues detected with GCC 12.1 #69778
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Revert MSVC changes for libunwind #69750
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reimplement I52/U52 in C, clean up and optimize range checks #69624
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fold System.Private.Interop into CoreLib #69508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support optional client certificates for MsQuicConnection #69603
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Set app context to null on thread detach #69796
    area-VM-meta-mono, mono-mirror, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable LLVM on device runs #69504
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #69668
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors for LA-ABI. #69771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Repro to work with recent changes #69769
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] retrieve results from browser bench sample #69673
  • Fix NRE in EmitCall for DynamicMethod #69027
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add Tizen persons in charge #69799
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Reenable tests for #63746. #69646
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Re-enable some HTTP3 tests #69789
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix the reference assembly so C++/CLI can still utilize System.Runtime #69714
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [HTTP/3] Added another H/3 server #69786
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Skip `COMMA`s when creating non-null assertions #69744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use top level statements in the repro app #69779
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Speed up ValueType.Equals #69768
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix duplicate transition for reverse delegates and expand our profiler tests for transitions to cover this case. #69761
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove destructors #69628
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix negative scenarios #69742
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Some cleanup on X509Certificate #69754
    area-System.Security
  • Add Linux Bionic to official build, for runtime packs #69749
    area-Build-mono
  • Use correct holder for `ThreadLocalModule`. #69762
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers, when LLVM is enabled #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Restore internal tools #69753
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix setting of DacpHeapSegmentData::highAllocMark on DAC side. #69670
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #69751
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the exception's dispatch by EPC. #69712
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
